Module imagingbook.core
Package imagingbook.core.jdoc

Annotation Type JavaDocBaseUrl

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({MODULE,PACKAGE}) public @interface JavaDocBaseUrl
This module or package-level annotation is used to specify a base URL for automatic retrieval of JavaDoc information. The URL is given WITH the module's name, e.g., for module imagingbook_plugins_book this is
https://imagingbook.github.io/imagingbook-public/javadoc/imagingbook_plugins_book
This information is used by JavaDocUtils.getJavaDocUrl(Class).
See Also:
  • JavaDocUtils.JAVADOC_BASE_URL

    Modifier and Type
    Required Element

    value
